text.__SUMMARY__: Piper sanctum is a plant in the family Piperaceae, endemic to Central America.
text.Synonyms:
Artanthe sancta Miq.
Piper diandrum C.DC.
Piper dissimulans Trel.
Piper heterophlebium Trel.
Piper papantlense C.DC.
Piper venulosum Trel.
text.References:
Prodr. 16(1) 330 1869.
The Plant List
Encyclopedia of Life
"Piper sanctum". Germplasm Resources Information Network (GRIN). Agricultural Research Service (ARS), United States Department of Agriculture (USDA).
